title: Christmas Snowball Arena
description: Christmas Snowball Arena is a 3D stickman snowball IO game. You have to compete with nine other players in collecting snow blocks and making your snowball bigger. The goal is to be the last player standing by defeating and collecting other snowballs. You can also collect blank snowballs that are free for anyone. You can use two power-ups in the game to boost your snowball: one that makes it twice as big and another that makes it twice as fast. If you are looking for some snowball action, try it!
instructions: Drag and swipe to control your snowball

title: Elevator Fight
description: Make your way to the top floor, one fight at a time. Every level, a new challenger steps in, but only one can ride up! With simple controls and over 130 levels, this game offers quick, close-quarters combat in a cramped elevator. Upgrade your fighter’s speed, power, and defense to keep up with the ever-changing, humorous opponents. What’s waiting at the top?
instructions: Use WASD or arrow keys on desktop to attack and dodge opponent's hits. On mobile, tap the opponent to attack, tap your fighter to avoid being hit.

title: Merge Fruit
description: Grapes are combined to become cherry! Cherries are combined to become tangerine! Tangerines are combined to....? Which fruit will come out next? Try to make the biggest golden watermelon!
instructions: Once the fruits have the same numbers and touch each other, they become bigger numbered fruits. Drop a fruit where you want to, and make bigger number of fruit as much as possible.

title: Carnage Battle Arena
description: Get Carnage now and discover a new kind of racing game! Driving fast and getting to the finish line is only one of the multiple challenges that await you. Wreak havoc on the streets thanks to the extensive destruction model that lets you not only damage vehicles, but also cause visible changes in the environment. After a long battle, the location will look nothing like it used to at the start! Whichever mode you choose, get ready for loads of adrenaline-pumping action! Play Carnage now!
instructions: Use mouse and keyboard for controls. Gamepad controllers supported on Chrome browser.

title: FaceChart
description: Do you dream of creating wild, fabulous looks like your favorite artists on social media? Dive into the enchanting realm of Face Chart! Wondering what a face chart is? It's your chic canvas to plan the next jaw-dropping, glamorous look. Grab a piece of paper and let it be your pocket-sized playground—experiment with new colors you hesitated to wear, pick and mix diverse designs for an endless array of possibilities.
instructions: – Don't waste time: controls are easy and intuitive – Explore a variety of inclusive options: diverse skin tones, a plethora of flattering colors, and on-trend looks – Change your pace: have a blast decorating your salon for added flair

title: Archery Ragdoll
description: Embark on an adrenaline-pumping adventure in this action-packed online game featuring thrilling ragdoll archer physics. Master the art of archery and prove your prowess!
instructions: Control the archer using the mouse or by touching the screen on the left highlighted part of the screen. Hold the mouse (finger) behind the archer's back to draw the bow (no need to pull it horizontally). Keeping the bow drawn, aim and release.

title: Jewel Miner Quest
description: The dazzling world of gems awaits! Participate in thrilling events within limited moves or time. Solve captivating puzzles, complete fun tasks, and enjoy daily bonuses. Discover many terrific surprises with every move and see how far you can go.
instructions: The game features limitless match-3 levels. Players connect three or more jewels to clear levels and progress. Four unique boosters help overcome challenges. Daily login rewards, the Lucky Wheel, and special tasks offer opportunities to earn prizes and enhance the gameplay experience.

title: Color Mix - Jelly Merge
description: This is an enthralling puzzle game with jellies. Dive into the world of exciting puzzles! Match jellies of the same color to reach new heights and beat high scores. With each level, the challenges get tougher and the fun gets bigger.
instructions: * Collect jellies of the same color to clear them! * Aim for large combos to increase your reward! * If you encounter difficulties, use bonuses!

title: Block Blasty Saga
description: Place the blocks on the board and crush them all! Complete the lines with the various block shapes and blast them all! Get ready to become the block master! Play the game in two modes: classic way and adventure mode. Try to achieve the highest score in Classic mode by blasting the most block amount, it is an infinite game mode and increases the fun with ASMR sounds. In Adventure mode, complete the tens of chapters and improve your block-crushing skills step by step. Join the saga now!
instructions: Use MOUSE and LEFT-CLICK to drag and drop the blocks. Use touch controls on mobile devices/tablets.

title: Connect 2 Cars
description: Connect 2 Cars: A Super Fun and Addictive Puzzle Game for All Ages. Connect 2 Cars is the ultimate puzzle game designed to entertain kids and adults alike! Whether you’re a puzzle enthusiast or simply looking for a relaxing and free-to-play game, Connect 2 Cars has something for everyone. Get ready to immerse yourself in hours of engaging gameplay as you challenge your brain and enjoy connecting adorable car tiles.
instructions: Mouse to play. The path must have no more than two turns—a real brain-teaser! Successfully remove all tiles to progress to the next level.

title: Wild Race Master 3d
description: Wild Race Master 3D is an exciting 3D racing game that brings you into a world of extreme speed!In this game, you can experience endless racing fun and drive various cool cars. Challenge the exciting track! ? Drive your beloved racing car through various unique and challenging tracks. You should show excellent driving skills on winding roads and be flexible when dealing with various complex track conditions.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Real Racing 3D
description: Immerse yourself in exciting racing! Play classic cars - step on the gas and win! Win championships and unlock new cars!
instructions: Controls: W, A, S, D - driving N - camera change Space - drift X - return P - pause, exit

title: Horror Forest Bear
description: Imagine an angry bear that has escaped from its cave in the forest. It's very hungry and wants to eat honey. You must help the bear. The bear is starving, and it needs to eat all the honey. You need to be very careful—it's a dark and dangerous forest, full of traps and hunters. The hunters have become much stronger because they can shoot with guns now. You must avoid the hunters. Escape from them, collect all the honey, and return to the bear's cave.
instructions: Use the "WASD" keys to move. Playable on both mobile and PC. Double jump is available. Eat all the honey, avoid the hunters, and safely return to the cave.

title: Stick Man Battle Fighting
description: Enter the world of Stick Man Battle Fighting and every move matters! This casual fighting game lets you unleash your skills in dynamic stickman battles against enemies. Master various fighting styles and begin exciting single-mode combat. Choose a weapon and customize your hero.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Stunt Bike Rider Bros
description: Stunt Bike Rider Bros is a motorcycle racing and show game that you can play in both 1 player and 2 player mode with your friend. There are 3 different game modes in the game. In the "Racing Mode", you can compete with both your friend and other motorcycle drivers. In the "Career Mode", try to complete the difficult stages in a limited time. In the "Open World", you can earn coins and diamonds by performing various stunts with your motorcycles.
instructions: PLAYER 1: Move: "W,A,S,D" or "ARROW KEYS" (1P Mode Only) Nitro: "L-SHIFT" Respawn: "R" Camera: "C" PLAYER 2 Move: "ARROW KEYS" Nitro: "N" Respawn: "U" Camera: "K"

title: Wild West Match 2: The Gold Rush
description: Wild West Match 2 immerses you in the thrilling Gold Rush era of the Wild West! Match three or more gold nuggets, cowboy hats, horseshoes, and other treasures to earn points and unlock new levels. Use Dynamite to clear obstacles or reveal hidden gold! With hundreds of challenging levels, you’ll dig through the Wild West to find hidden treasures and secrets. Ready to strike it rich? Join the Gold Rush adventure now!
instructions: In Wild West Match 2, match three or more items like gold nuggets, cowboy hats, and horseshoes to score points and reach level goals. Use Dynamite to clear obstacles or uncover hidden gold. Each level has specific objectives—complete them before you run out of moves! Plan your moves wisely to make the most of boosters and power-ups. Keep digging through hundreds of levels to discover more treasures in the Gold Rush!

title: Road Race 3d
description: Road Race 3D is an exciting racing game that allows you to ride on a challenging track! You will experience the perfect combination of 3D racing and parkour. Use flexible operation and quick reaction to win every game! To draw a vehicle, a vehicle will randomly appear for you.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Lipstick Collector Run
description: Lipstick Collector Run is a classic vertical arcade game with a single-button control. Your mission: collect all the lipstick parts while dodging obstacles and earn money. Unlock marked levels by completing 8 wraps. Use money to draw 8 different colors. Earn extra cash with 8 hands that boost your lipstick collection. The more lipsticks you gather, the more money you’ll make!
instructions: Swipe left and right = move

title: Snake King
description: Get ready to slither your way to the top in this addictive take on the classic Snake game! As the Snake King, you’ll navigate through a maze-like arena, avoiding collisions with the four walls and your own tail.
instructions: Eat apples, grow bigger. Don't crash against the wall.

title: Solitaire Deluxe Edition
description: Everyone's favorite classic card game is back. And this time, it's even more fancy and awesome! Feast your eyes on the classic game that has been upgraded to look even better than before. Try your hand once again and see if you can beat it like you used to. Is it all skill or does luck have some say in the matter? Come play now and let's find out!
instructions: You can choose to play with 1-draw or 3-draw from the deck. Arrange the cards in descending order to free up space and uncover new cards. Place the cards in ascending order at the top, starting from the ace. Complete all 4 suits to beat the game.

title: Ellie Christmas Makeup
description: Experience the joy of festive makeovers with Ellie Christmas Makeup game! This fun, holiday game lets you guide Ellie to create three Christmas-themed makeup looks: Candy Cane Queen, Christmas Queen, and iconic character-inspired. Perfect for makeup lovers and enthusiasts of holiday-themed games alike, this girl game takes you on a journey filled with creativity, color, and Christmas cheer! Craft Ellie's look using assorted eyeshadows, lipsticks, patterned blushes, accessories, and more.
instructions: Use your mouse to play this game on desktops or tap to play on mobile devices.

title: End Of World
description: There are only 337 coins left in the world, collect them faster than the rest You will appear in a post-apocalyptic world With coins, you can unlock unique items in the world, but you'll have to find them first Summoning waves you can get even more coins if you don't let the monsters get close to you By completing the race, you will be able to convert your achievements into victory points and buy a unique incredibly powerful weapon! And remember, you need to collect all the coins!
instructions: Moving around the world Collecting coins and buying items that are inside the blue glass ball The E button will work to interact with the environment Mouse wheel to zoom in on the minimap You can always restart the game in the menu by pressing the leftmost top button There is also a weapon shop in the menu that can be equipped

title: Snow Race 3d Fun Racing
description: Snow Race 3D: Fun Racing is an addictive arcade game. Do you want to participate in a snow race? This is probably the most fascinating and addictive game you have ever played! Collect the snow around you to make huge snowballs, then let them build ladders and climb to higher levels. Your opponents will have the same talent and you will have to race against time to race against them! Be the first to reach the finish line to win! Come join us and become a snowball master!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Football Fun
description: Play as a team of 3 players against your opponents. Score goals and deflect attacks. Become the best player! The game has a store where you can buy many different balls and even stadiums. And the best players get on the leaderboard.
instructions: PC: Control WASD, pass\steal V, kick >N, fint\change player B, speed M Phone: Control - joystick pass\steal A, kick C, fint\change player B

title: Little Candy Bakery
description: Little candy bakery is a puzzle match 3 game, bake the candy and match candies together to win. The game theme is calm and entertaining. Players can use power-ups such as rockets bombs and marmalades to bake faster and collect more candy. You can challenge your friends and see who can score higher. Little candy bakery is free to play candy puzzle game Have fun playing Little candy bakery sweetest match 3 puzzle game around!
instructions: Click the left click on the mouse to move the items left,right,up and down

title: Slime Rush
description: Join the colorful adventure of *Slime Rush*! Control a lively group of slimes as you race along challenging paths, avoiding obstacles and growing your slimes. Collect gems to unlock unique skins and power-ups. Can you lead your slimes to victory? Start your journey in *Slime Rush* today!
instructions: Swipe on the screen to move your slimes left or right!

title: Mini Shooters
description: Mini Shooters: Experience fast-paced 2D action! Customize your loadout with a variety of powerful weapons. Dominate the battlefield with strategic movement and precise aim. Test your skills in thrilling deathmatch modes.
instructions: arrow keys & WSAD to move. space to pick the weapon.

title: Domino Adventure
description: Discover three match durations to suit your style. Showcase your skills and logic in each round, and use strategic moves to outplay your opponents. Perfect for puzzle enthusiasts seeking endless fun and challenges.
instructions: Dominoes involves placing tiles to match numbers and score points. You can customize your game with 8 collectible domino sets and choose between Block and Draw modes for varied gameplay. Accelerate your progress by collecting sets and unlock exclusive bonuses through the Trophy Road.

title: Slope Snowball
description: Slope SnowBall is an intriguing endless-running game with a winter theme. Your aim is to roll a snowball as far as possible down slopes full of hazards!
instructions: To control your snowball - A/Q/Left arrow = Move left - D/R/Right arrow = Move right

title: Madness: Sheriff’s Compound OFFICIAL
description: Madness: Sheriff's Compound is a thrilling, action-packed survival game where players must navigate a chaotic compound overrun by anarchy and danger. Set in a gritty, lawless frontier, the game pits players against waves of unpredictable enemies, demanding quick reflexes, sharp strategy, and resourceful thinking to survive. Madness: Sheriff’s Compound OFFICIAL is the one and only authentic game of the Madness series, available on gamedistribution.com and itch
instructions: WASD - Move LMB - SHOOT R - RELOAD GUN Middle Scroll - Change Gun

title: Chicken shooter io
description: SUPER COOL SHOOTER game, in which you will plunge into exciting fights with chickens, roosters and chickens. Your task is to choose the best equipment and make full use of your shooting skills to defeat other characters in this feathered battle!
instructions: The goal of the game is to destroy all enemies using powerful weapons. Desktop controls - WASD for movement, Mouse for review and attack. Control on a mobile device - touch / swipe.

title: Steal Items io
description: Grab everything in your hands and steal items! You play for a flexible and funny stickman who can't stand on his feet straight. You need to run faster to the largest and most expensive items in the houses, grab them and deliver them to the truck. You have to steal a lot of items, because besides you, there are other stickmen running around the house who also want to rob this house. Beat them on points and collect more furniture.
instructions: The goal of the game is to collect as many expensive items as possible and take them to the truck. Desktop management - WASD. Management on a mobile device - swipe.

title: Winter Gifts
description: Winter Gifts is retro a platforming-puzzle game where you grab or throw gifts. Give the gifts to children at Christmas to make them happy :).
instructions: Desktop: -A, D, or Arrow Keys to Move. -W, U, X, I, or Up Arrow to Jump. -U, C, O, or Space to Grab or throw a Gift. Mobile: -Ingame Controls.

title: Santa Vs Skritch
description: Everyone is busy celebrating Christmas and enjoying the holidays. But a critical showdown is happening somewhere in the woods! Play against a friend or family member or challenge the AI to a duel. Do your best to kick the present past your opponent and score! Will you help Santa or the Skritch? Come play now and show off your skills!
instructions: Play as Santa or Skritch. For Player 1, use the WASD keys to move around and B to kick. For Player 2, use the arrow keys to move around and K to kick. Try and score the most goals within the time limit.

title: Athena Match
description: Embark on a mythical journey in Athena Match, a Match 3 game set in Ancient Greece. Guided by the goddess Athena, match three or more identical artifacts to clear levels and uncover Greek secrets. Stunning visuals and rich soundscapes bring this world to life as you solve puzzles and overcome mythical obstacles inspired by Greek lore. Ready to prove your skills? Join Athena and dive into the adventure!
instructions: Match three or more identical artifacts to clear them from the board. Each level has a specific goal, such as collecting certain artifacts or clearing obstacles. You have a limited number of moves to complete the task, so plan carefully! Use special boosters and Athena's guidance to help you overcome tough challenges. Keep an eye out for unique obstacles inspired by Greek mythology. Match wisely and progress through levels to unlock more of the legendary world!

title: Countryside Driving Quest
description: Immerse yourself in Countryside Driving Quest, a dynamic driving game that lets you explore picturesque rural landscapes with a variety of challenges to master. Navigate through charming country roads, test your parking skills in tight spots, and perfect your drifting on winding paths. Designed with realistic physics and stunning visuals, this game brings the peaceful yet thrilling experience of countryside driving right to your screen.
instructions: Use Arrow and WASD to drive R to reset Space to brake

title: Stick Fight The Chaos
description: Hello young warriors! In Stick Fight The Chaos, the fierce battles between stickmen continue with even more action! Catch the weapons falling from the sky, challenge your opponent and become the champion of the battlefield! Keep your balance, focus on your enemy and keep fighting! Each level brings new surprises. Play alone or with a friend and defeat your opponents!
instructions: What to expect in Stick Fight The Chaos: - More challenging and exciting new levels - More enemy warriors to fight against - Win battles to earn money and buy special powers and new weapons - Use powerful weapons to defeat your enemies and grow stronger - Face tougher opponents with each new level!

title: Tip Tap!
description: Get ready for a challenging and fun physics-based skill game where your goal is simple: move either the dynamic plate or the ball to reach the emoji smiley and complete the level without falling off the edge? Key Features -50+ skill-challenging levels that ramp up in difficulty as you progress -Physics-based gameplay that tests your precision and timing -Dynamic controls: move the plate or the ball to reach the goal
instructions: -Press spacebar or click on screen to move plate or ball -Make the object reach the smiley face -Stay for 3 seconds -Avoid falling off!

title: Xiblba Match
description: Xiblba Match Seasons 1 is one of the new Match 3 games from the creators of the SIDM GAMES STUDIO, Xiblba Match Seasons. The most beautiful Xiblba Match. The second sequel features a BIG content update with new levels and a relaxing soundtrack to enjoy!
instructions: Use touch controls or the mouse to swap and match . Combine at least 3 images of the same kind to make them disappear.

title: Secrets of Charmland
description: ● Unique gameplay: help Emma treat her friends by swapping and matching delicious sweets! ● Tons of match-3 levels filled with exciting elements, awesome boosters and explosive combinations! ● A world full of Charmland: discover all the magical places it has to offer! ● Fantastic characters: watch Emma making new acquaintances and helping them with their unusual quests.
instructions: Match three or more elements of the same color together to collect them and reach your goals. Collect enough elements to complete levels and open new locations.

title: 3D FPS Target Shooting
description: 3D FPS Target Shooting is an addictive 3D FPS game. The logic of the game is very simple, use your weapon to aim and shoot various targets to get higher scores. Simple and unique gun control experience, aiming and shooting at the targets can be done easily with one hand.Kar98k, M24, and AWM are amazing weapons you can unlock them using the coins you get from passing the levels. The game is completely free and you can play it online on any device!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Black pink Black Friday Fever
description: Blackpink Black Friday Fever is a fun dress-up game designed for K-pop and Blackpink fans! Dive into the world of style by creating unique looks for Jisoo, Jennie, Rosé, and Lisa, inspired by Black Friday’s biggest fashion trends. As a fan, you’ll get to style each member of Blackpink with a range of outfits and accessories that perfectly suit their personalities.
instructions: Left Mouse Button Click or Tap to play

title: Suika Kawaii Cat Merge game
description: The game is a fun, puzzle-based merging game where players control a dropper that releases animals onto the field. Players must carefully move the dropper to align and drop matching animals. When two of the same type collide, they merge into a higher-level animal. The goal is to keep merging and progressing to create new animals. Special buttons offer abilities like shaking the container or merging random animals, adding strategy and excitement to the gameplay.
instructions: Tap and hold to move the dropper, then release to drop an animal. Match two of the same type to merge into a higher-level animal. Use ability buttons to shake the container or trigger random merges. Merge animals to unlock new levels and increase your score. Earn combo bonuses by merging quickly and efficiently. Strategize your drops and merges to optimize progression. Keep merging to reach higher levels and set new records!

title: Mona Lisa Fashion Experiments
description: Welcome to a small humorous adventure in which you will try on the role of a stylist for the most mysterious lady of all time - Mona Lisa Gioconda. Connect the past and the present by mocking trends and memes. Each of your changes is a small work of art, and each outfit immediately causes fireworks of pleasant emotions. There is no framework here - only freedom of expression. And the variety of images is guaranteed to make your time in the game unforgettable!
instructions: Show your imagination and creativity in fashionable experiments with the iconic masterpiece of world painting. Choose makeup, outfits and accessories for Mona Lisa to achieve the main goal - your good mood! Interesting images of the main character can be saved as PNG images. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch on touch screens is used to control it.

title: Going Balls Adventure 2
description: Going Balls Adventure 2 is a ball-rolling arcade game with a 3D game engine. Your main mission is to collect black balls and reach the checkpoint. Your side mission is to collect all coins on the platform. It doesn't matter if you don't fish the job. Before the level begins, you have a chance to try some free skins for you to decide on a favorite one.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Drive, Race, Crash
description: Drive, Race, Crash is a game that will give you hours of fun and adrenaline. Drive a variety of cars, choose your own style of play and go to conquer the tracks in races, participate in derbies, jump off the ramp or explore the city
instructions: Collect stars on the levels to unlock the coolest cars and participate in the leaderboard. Use the pause menu to enter the garage or the map, as well as to control the sound in racing, derby, ramp jumping and free riding around the city. PC Management: W or forward arrow - gas; A or left arrow - turn left; S or back arrow - brake / reverse movement; D or right arrow - turn right; Management on mobile devices: Using the control buttons on the screen

title: Driver Master Simulator
description: Driver Master Simulator is a 3D vehicle driving game. In Truck Mode, your task is to swiftly transport animals to their destinations. All transport missions have tight time constraints. Once you’ve earned $20,000, unlock Bus Mode and take the wheel of a bus. Reach $30,000, and Chopper Mode lets you pilot a helicopter. Feeling cash-strapped? Watch ads to claim $10,000 each time!
instructions: On PC WASD or Arrow keys = move Tap the button = nitro On Mobile Tap buttons on the screen

title: Jailbreak Assault
description: In Jailbreak Assault, you’re a prisoner on a daring escape mission. Starting in your cell, you grab a key dropped by a guard, unlock the door, and arm yourself with a baton. Battle guards, destroy vital documents, disable cameras, and unlock new areas as you fight your way through each mission. Eventually, you’ll secure a gun from the armory, using it to take on the heavily guarded outer perimeter. Can you make it to freedom?
instructions: - Arrow Key/ WASD to Move - E to interact - G to use Molotov - Left mouse to use weapon - Scroll to change weapon - Z to AIM - Right mouse to Scope - L to lock and unlock mouse

title: Castle Craft
description: Embark on a mystical journey in Castle Craft, where you merge resources and unlock the secrets of time. Start in a land cloaked in fog, using ancient keys to reveal hidden territories and trace your lost family's steps across eras.
instructions: Merge to Restore and Explore! Begin by merging three wheat sprouts to cultivate a full wheat crop. Continue merging similar items in garden beds to fully mature the wheat. Harvest the wheat and trade it for keys that dispel the fog and open new areas. Unlock new items and heroes to assist in reclaiming and revitalizing the land!

title: Deadlock.io
description: Deadlock.io is an exciting game in the deadlock setting, where you capture territories and avoid enemies. Compete for the territory in thrilling battles! Become the leader of the arena like in paper.io!
instructions: Control your character and capture territory like in paperio. Return to your base, but don’t touch the line you leave behind. Be careful cause enemies are racing around, competing with you, and trying to cross your trail. The winner is the one who covers the entire map first. On PC: Use the mouse or the arrow keys/WASD on the keyboard to move your character. On mobile: Control with your fingers on the screen.
